COMPUTER MUSEUM REDESIGN

FINAL RESULT →

A redesign of a site based on findings from a heuristic evaluation, ultimately presented through a developed responsive site. This project had a heavy emphasis on solving established usability issues. The final site was developed using HTML and Sass within 11ty.

  • FALL 2020 / SUMMER 2021
  • UI / UX DESIGN
  • HTML / SASS
  • 11ty
